welcome.title: WELCOME TO THE PROVIDER HUB
welcome.subtitle: CASETAST.COM - THE ULTIMATE PROVIDER SOLUTION
welcome.description1: Casetest is a business promotion platform built by freelancers worldwide, providing a reliable way for freelancers to quickly acquire clients. With its 'pay after success' model, casetest has become the best choice for top freelancers to gain clients with zero risk. our core mission is to streamline project communication, enhance transaction efficiency, and help both parties reach agreements quickly.
welcome.description2: casetest offers cross-platform project transaction tools, designed specifically for high-quality project needs, covering both web and mobile applications. To better assist providers in expanding their client base and improving project efficiency, transactions between providers and their existing clients are completely free. Payments are made directly to the provider’s account, with no transaction fees, allowing for seamless transactions between providers and their clients.

invite.description1: Help your provider grow their business! Invite them to join casetest as a paid user, and both of you will earn great rewards!
invite.description2: No transaction fees for projects with existing clients you bring to the platform, except for new clients acquired through the platform. casetest helps freelancers build their offline reputation and is the best platform for expanding their client base.

card1.title: Customizable Requirement Templates
card1.text: Create and manage custom order templates to simplify the project requirement gathering process. Providers can easily share these templates to improve communication and minimize errors and confusion.

card2.title: Credit Rating System
card2.text: Utilize CASE's credit rating tools to convert each transaction into a reputation asset, helping you attract more business opportunities and clients.

card3.title: Flexible Fee Structure
card3.text: Platform fees start at 36.5% and gradually decrease to as low as 6.5% based on transaction history. This flexible fee structure helps providers quickly build their client base and stay competitive.

card4.title: CASE Certification
card4.text: Boost your professional profile with CASE certification. The certification process includes a thorough evaluation of skills, helping providers stand out in the market.

card5.title: Premium Upgrades
card5.text: As a paid user, providers gain access to professional contract generation tools, unlimited order templates, and more efficient communication systems. Premium users also benefit from enhanced voice call security and the ability to set commission rates based on business fluctuations, accelerating order acquisition and expanding client base.

attributes.description: The additional cost of taking on projects is communication. Project communication can consume a third or even more than half of the total time. Providers often have to repeatedly explain their expertise to clients with varying levels of understanding, introduce themselves to new clients, and inquire about needs that the clients themselves may not fully understand. Even when requirements are clear, drafting effective contracts can still be a challenge. There is also a lack of trust and balance between providers and clients.

section1.title: Streamlined Communication
section1.description: Simplify the communication process with clients using standardized requirement templates. Providers can create custom order templates based on their business needs and share them with clients. Clients can easily place orders using these templates, enhancing communication efficiency and reducing misunderstandings and unnecessary discussions.

section2.title: Credit System
section2.description: Build your professional reputation with our reliable credit rating system. Every successful transaction, whether from online or offline clients, adds to your reputation asset and converts into new business opportunities.

section3.title: Flexible Bidding
section3.description: Engage in targeted bidding based on your business expectations and regional specifics. Platform fees start at 16.5% and decrease to as low as 6.5% based on your transaction history with the same clients. This flexible policy helps you quickly secure orders and build a stable client base.

section4.title: CASE Certification
section4.description: Enhance your professional image with CASE certification. We rigorously evaluate each provider's skills to ensure they meet high industry standards. Only certified providers are eligible to participate in platform bidding and rankings, ensuring top-quality service delivery.

certification.title: Certification
certification.logoDescription: Once CASE certification is obtained, the CASE official authorized logo will appear on your page, and you can also print the CASE logo on business cards or display it on your website.
certification.requirement1: Individual users must be 25 years old or above** Company users must have been established for 2 years or more**
certification.requirement2: Proof of 3+ years of industry work experience (Invitees are exempt)
certification.requirement3: Proof of 2+ successful deals (Invitees are exempt)
certification.requirement4: Pass an industry work professional skills interview (Invitees are exempt)
certification.requirement5: Pay a deposit of $2,500-$10,000 depending on the industry (Invitees are exempt)
certification.requirement6: Or pay a one-time certification fee: $250 for individual / $1,000 for company (Invitees are exempt)
certification.eligible: Congratulations! you are eligible to apply
certification.reviewTitle: We carefully review every certification application
certification.reviewSubtitle: and intelligently match clients with the best providers
certification.additionalTime: Does not include time for mailing additional materials if requested

growWithUs.description1: Currently, we only support certification services

feedback.successMessage: We will carefully consider and implement your suggestions, we are committed to improving and look forward to hearing more from you
